The Cylinder class extends the Tube class and represents a cylinder in 3D space.

Plane
The Plane class extends the Geometry class
Point
This class make point in 3D space xyz coordinates of a point
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
RadialGeometry
The RadialGeometry class extends the Geometry class and represents a radial geometry object in the 3D space with a radius value
Ray
This class make ray in 3D space head point and direction vector
Sphere
The Sphere class extends the RadialGeometry class
Triangle
Triangle class represents a triangle in 3D Cartesian coordinate
Tube

Vector
The Vector class extends the Point class to represent a vector in 3D space.
